item.description:
We are a raw vegan cafe offering delicious, high quality, raw vegan meals. We support local farms and seek out the very best organic ingredients from socially and environmentally conscious suppliers. We are committed to quality and want to share our passion for good food with the community. We refrain from using gluten, soy, sugar, honey, mushrooms and all animal products. All our packaging is compostable or reusable. Revitalive is truly living foods that offers real healing solutions that taste GREAT! Revitalive Cafe offers everything to-go so you can integrate raw food easily into your busy life. www.revitalivecafe.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Feel free to print a name tag and contact members via messages to carpool. http://www.meetup.com/RawBoston/grow/nametags/

See our Message Boards for more events and information.
http://www.meetup.com/RawBoston/messages/boards
item.how_to_find_us: Feel free to print name tag and carpool. www.meetup.com/RawBoston/grow/nametags
item.why: Meet lively people and enjoy lively food!
item.name: REVITALIVE CAFE (Newburyport) 3rd Saturday
